name: Crafted_Glimpse_of_the_Abyss_E
display_name: Crafted Glimpse of the Abyss E
display_fullname: Boosts.Crafted Glimpse of the Abyss E
display_help: Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, Fear duration by {Boost.Attrib.Mez.Scale}% and reduces the attack rate by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%.
